Fn::Join:
Next steps:
1. Build Docker image: cd /Users/shunsuke/Dev/youtube-moviemarketer-api && docker build -f Dockerfile.lambda -t miyabi-moviemarketer-api .
2. Tag image: docker tag miyabi-moviemarketer-api:latest 112530848482.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.

/miyabi-moviemarketer-api:latest
3. Login to ECR: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 112530848482.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.

/miyabi-moviemarketer-api:latest
5. Get API key: aws apigateway get-api-key --api-key
